reference.title: Input data formats (CSV)
reference.shortdesc: Field definitions for the rankings and capitals datasets.

section.title: TopUni.csv (rankings)
section.p: Each row contains 9 fields. The analyzer uses the following subset:

strow.stentry: Top international rank (minimum value) for the selected country.
Printed in output; checked against the capital name.
Top national rank (minimum value) for the selected country.
Average score and continent-relative score computations.

section.title: capitals.csv (country metadata)
section.p: Each row contains 6 fields. The analyzer uses:

strow.stentry: Lookup key for capital/continent by country.
Printed in output and used for capital-name matching.
Used to compute max score in continent.
